Package tech_demo

Implements the logic behind tech demonstrations used in the project.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    Implements a couple of simple animations to be displayed on the Launchpad S.
    IdleAnimations
    This class will implement subtle animations that will play when the program has been running on the main GUI screen with no game or tech demo running for a while (probably 30 seconds).
    Line
    Implements Line animations
    Metronome
    Implements methods to play a metronome, for use with the Piano Demo.
    ReactiveDemo
    Implements a couple of simple animations to be displayed on the Launchpad S whenever the user presses a pad.
    ScrollingText
    This class implements a way to display text on the Launchpad S.
    TechDemo
    Tech Demos superclass

Package tech_demo Description

Implements the logic behind tech demonstrations used in the project.
These constitute a reactive input demonstration, animations and scrolling text
